results.text:
PERSONAL SKILLS

● Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
● Skilled in designing system architecture and technical solutions
● Detail oriented with ability to identify functional gaps
● Eﬀective leader and team motivator
results.context: List of personal skills and attributes

results.text:
SKILLS & ABILITIES

Technical Skills: Java, C++, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Kotlin, C#, ASP.NET, AngularJs, React, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Python, Django, FastAPI, Laravel, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS
results.context: List of technical skills and programming languages

results.text: Technical Skills: Java, C++, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Kotlin, Firebase, C#, ASP.NET, AngularJs, React, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Python, Django, FastAPI, Laravel, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS
results.context: List of programming languages and technologies known

results.text: Career Objective: A graduating student committed to learning industry best practices, including end-to-end development processes, client requirement analysis, and technology-driven problem solving. Seeks a role that cultivates technical depth, leadership capability, and eager hands-on experience while supporting initiatives involving artificial intelligence and modern application architectures. Aims to build a strong foundation in solution design and system architecture as part of a long-term career in the technology field.
results.context: Career goals focusing on technical depth and leadership in technology

results.text: Achievements/Responsibilities: - Served as Project Manager for a bakeshop attendance and salary computation web application (MERN stack), leading end-to-end project execution from client consultation to delivery, gathering and validating requirements, contributing to system architecture and business logic, evaluating technical approaches, resolving design issues, managing tasks via Trello, coordinating stakeholder communication, preparing SPMP/SRS/SDD documentation, and performing comprehensive scenario-based manual testing to ensure system quality and alignment with project standards.
results.context: Project management experience in web application development

results.text:
CAREER OBJECTIVE

A graduating student committed to learning industry best practices, including end-to-end development processes, client requirement analysis, and technology-driven problem solving. Seeks a role that cultivates technical depth, leadership capability, and eager hands-on experience while supporting initiatives involving artiﬁcial intelligence and modern application architectures. Aims to build a strong foundation in solution design and system architecture as part of a long-term career in the technology ﬁeld.
results.context: Career goals focused on AI and modern application architectures

results.text:
ACHIEVEMENTS/RESPONSIBILITY

● Led the development of a logistics company web application integrating Agentic AI with LLM capabilities for knowledge base querying, AI assistant task automation, and dynamic data mapping and entry. Utilized Python, LangChain, LangGraph, and OpenAI LLM and embedding models as Capstone Project (currently in development).
● Served as Project Manager for a bakeshop attendance and salary computation web application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
results.context: Key projects and leadership roles undertaken

SECTION 4: HUMAN RESOURCES (HR) AND

4.3 Training and Development 
SAFEXPRESS LOGISTICS INC. values continuous learning. The company provides ongoing 
training to maintain a skilled team and sustain the best service for our customers. Employees 
are expected to actively participate in all mandatory training sessions related to safety, quality, 
and new technology (e.g., WMS updates). 
 
This document is a sample and should be finalized by the SAFEXPRESS LOGISTICS INC. 
management and HR department with specific legal and regulatory clauses, detailed job

- Led the design and development of an agentic AI system for a logistics company web application, integrating LLM-powered knowledge-base querying, an AI assistant capable of emulating real assistant workflows, and intelligent data mapping with automated data entry. Built core AI workflows using Python, React, LangChain, LangGraph, and OpenAI LLM/embedding models, with agent services deployed independently as microservices on AWS as part of an ongoing Capstone Project.
results.context: AI system design and development for logistics application

3.1 Code of Conduct and Professionalism 
All employees are expected to conduct themselves with the highest degree of professionalism,

with clients and partners must be professional, cooperative, and focused on solving their 
needs.

structures, and operational strategies are strictly confidential and must not be disclosed

results.text:
1.1 Welcome Message 
Welcome to the SAFEXPRESS LOGISTICS INC. team! 
You are now part of a dynamic and ISO 9001:2015 QMS Certified company committed to 
delivering reliable, compliant logistics solutions across the Philippines. Our success is driven by 
our people—a skilled and experienced team dedicated to operational excellence. This manual is 
your guide to our company's policies, culture, standards, and expectations. We trust that you will 
use it as a resource to uphold the high standards of Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, and

EDUCATION

University of Santo Tomas - BS in Information Technology
August 2022 - June 2026

University of Santo Tomas - BA inEconomics
August 2018 - June 2022

● *Confidentiality: All company information, client data, inventory details, pricing*
structures, and operational strategies are strictly confidential and must not be disclosed
to unauthorized parties.


</s> <s=13> *3.2 Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE)*


</s> <s=11> Due to the nature of logistics, strict adherence to HSE protocols is mandatory.


● *Zero-Accident Policy: All personnel are required to follow safety procedures, wear*
appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) in designated areas (e.g.,
warehouses, yards), and report all hazards, near-misses, and incidents immediately.
● *Compliance: All transport operations must strictly adhere to local and national traffic*
laws and regulations. All warehouse operations must comply with industry safety
standards, particularly for Cold, Temperature-Controlled, and Ambient storage.

<s=13> *_ 4.0 Disaster Scenario: Major Power and Network Outage _*


</s> <s=11> *_ 4.1 Response and Activation _*


_1._ *_ Immediate Action: IC to declare Level 2 (Major Disruption). _*
_2._ *_ Communication: Activate satellite/backup communication devices. Notify all critical _*
_personnel via SMS/alternative channel._
_3._ *_ WMS/IT: IT Lead immediately switches to off-site cloud servers (if applicable) or initiates _*
*_ Backup & Recovery Procedure (Refer to IT Manual). _*


*_ 4.2 Logistics Continuity Protocol _*


_●_ *_ Dispatch: Switch to manual dispatch procedures using pre-printed Delivery Order (DO) _*
*_ and Bill of Lading (BOL) forms. Log all movements via secure chat groups. _*
_●_ *_ Warehouse: Halt all non-critical picking/packing. Receiving must be done manually, _*
*_ creating handwritten Receiving Reports. No movement of High-Value Cargo without _*
_dual sign-off._
_●_ *_ Data: Once systems are restored,

</s> <s=17> *SECTION 1: INTRODUCTION AND WELCOME*


</s> <s=13> *1.1 Welcome Message*


</s> <s=11> Welcome to the SAFEXPRESS LOGISTICS INC. team!


You are now part of a dynamic and ISO 9001:2015 QMS Certified company committed to
delivering reliable, compliant logistics solutions across the Philippines. Our success is driven by
our people—a skilled and experienced team dedicated to operational excellence. This manual is
your guide to our company's policies, culture, standards, and expectations. We trust that you will
*use it as a resource to uphold the high standards of Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, and*
*Morale that define the Safexpress family.*


</s> <s=13> *1.2 Purpose of the Manual*


</s> <s=11> This manual serves as the definitive reference for all employees regarding the standards,
policies, and procedures of SAFEXPRESS LOGISTI

4.1 Work Hours and Attendance 
All employees are expected to adhere to their scheduled work hours and locations (Head Office, 
Warehouse, Field, etc.). Punctuality and reliable attendance are essential to maintaining the 
efficiency of our 24/7 logistics operations. Absences and tardiness must be reported according 
to department-specific procedures.
Step  Action  Responsibility  Quality/Safety Check
